Header: Debate on no-confidence motion against the PM begins
Content: COLOMBO (News 1 st ) – The debate on the Motion of No-Confidence against Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe begins. The debate will go on until 9.30 PM and following the debate, voting on the motion of no-confidence is scheduled to take place at 9.30 PM tonight. The No-Confidence motion was hand over to Speaker Karu Jayasuriya by a group of Joint Opposition Parliamentarians including Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa on the 16th of March. 55 Members of Parliament have signed the No Confidence motion, however, former President Mahinda Rajapaksa hasn’t done so. Ministers G.B. Ekanayake, Nishantha Mutuhettigama, and K. Cadre Masthan of the SLFP are among those who have signed the No-confidence motion.
